```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
```

```{r}
usa <- map_data("usa")
canada <- map_data("world", "canada")
north_america <- ggplot() + geom_polygon(data = usa, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group)) + geom_polygon(data = canada, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group)) +theme_bw()
```

```{r}
cities <- data.frame(
  city = c("San Francisco", "Toronto", "Los Angeles", "Vancouver", "Seattle", "San Diego", "New York", "Washington DC", "Chicago"),
  lat = c(37.773972, 43.639217, 34.052235, 49.246292, 47.608013, 32.715736, 40.730610, 38.930176, 41.881832),
  long = c(-122.431297, -79.400414, -118.243683, -123.116226, -122.335167, -117.161087, -73.935242, -77.070503, -87.623177),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

north_america + 
  geom_point(data=cities, aes(x = long, y = lat), color="red", size = 2)
```
